mapper.select: SELECT `Id`, `GroupId`, `UserId`, `Locale`, `MeetingDate`, `Cost`, (CASE WHEN STATUS=1 THEN 'true' WHEN STATUS=0 THEN 'false' ELSE 'none' END ) AS `Status` FROM GroupStudyLog WHERE `UserId`='cksdud' AND DATE(`MeetingDate`) >= CURDATE() AND DATE(`MeetingDate`) < CURDATE()+INTERVAL 7 DAY ORDER BY `MeetingDate` ASC

SELECT si.`BoardId`, si.`UserId`, si.`Locale`,si.`SeminarStartDate`,si.`SeminarEndDate`,bo.Nickname FROM JoiningAndRecruitmentLog jr INNER JOIN SeminarInfo si ON jr.`ApplyUserId`='cksdud' AND si.SeminarEndDate >= CURDATE() AND jr.BoardId=si.BoardId INNER JOIN Board bo ON jr.`BoardId`=bo.Id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JoiningAndRecruitmentLog jr INNER JOIN SeminarInfo si ON jr.ApplyUserId='cksdud' AND jr.BoardId=si.BoardId
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ParentId) FROM UserLearningLog WHERE `UserId`='cksdud'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ToDoList WHERE `UserId`='cksdud' AND IFNULL(`EndDate`,CURDATE())>=CURDATE()

SELECT l.ParentId, b.UserId, b.Nickname, b.Title, d.IntroContent, format((COUNT(if(l.CurrentTime=l.Duration,1,null)))/ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Board b WHERE l.ParentId=b.ParentId)*100,-1) AS LearningRate FROM UserLearningLog l INNER JOIN Board b ON l.ParentId=b.Id INNER JOIN LectureDetailInfo d ON l.ParentId=d.Id WHERE l.UserId='cksdud' GROUP BY l.ParentId

SELECT g.GroupId, b.Nickname, b.Title, b.Content, b.WriteDate FROM GroupMemberInfo g INNER JOIN Board b ON b.BoardKindId='GrpNt' AND g.GroupId=b.GroupId WHERE g.UserId='cksdud' ORDER BY b.WriteDate DESC LIMIT 10
